Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed

Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and the next occurrence of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 measured as the time until any definitive reviewer response (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-EIC Major Revision in end-to-end revision trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-AE Recommendation overdue in prolonged review cycles
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that eventually reach editorial decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 when followed by a successful SW-Reviewer Agreed versus when followed by another reminder or decline
